paragraph: Now, in the city, Casey Chen, a life-debtor, must steal back ten years from LifeHock's vault before a deadline. When the life-harvesting regime's time-repo agents forces Casey Chen to commit, there is no turning back. After a brutal setback, Casey Chen realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise. Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame. In a final confrontation, Casey Chen faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
moral_premise: People succeed when they act with courage, and they fail when they protect themselves at the cost of justice.

When the life-harvesting regime's time-repo agents forces Casey Chen to commit, there is no turning back.
After a brutal setback, Casey Chen realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise.
Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame.
In a final confrontation, Casey Chen faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
